title: Bug 20249 - Change editor/view/perspective F1 help missing
description: When the change editor menu is open, pressing F1 is supposed to display some help. However, the help window closes immediately, before the contents can be read. The F1 key should keep the help window open for the user to read the contents properly.
OB: Pressing F1 while the change editor menu is open should display help and keep the help window open until the user closes it.
EB: The help window closes immediately after pressing F1 in the change editor menu without allowing the user to read the contents.
SR: Ensure that pressing F1 in the change editor menu displays help and keeps the help window open until the user closes it.
